item.title: 【Helpdesk】Opening my DMs for downloading YT Originals
item.description:
Since I have YouTube Premium, I will be opening my DMs to allow these downloads.

GUIDELINES
  • BYOCS (Bring Your Own Cloud Storage) or GoFile can be requested (You need to download it before it expires)
  • I can't guarantee quick replies
  • I accept YouTube Originals, Premium Afterparties, and Anything with premium branding.
  • I will accept 1080p Premium videos, but I will include yt-dlp+ffmpeg in a zip file just in case.
item.author: charlescanlom
